00023 #ifndef _CTK_TYPES_H
00024 #define _CTK_TYPES_H

00035 # include <spu_intrinsics.h>

00039 /* Basic types (PowerPC 64 bit) */
00040 typedef char                 ctk_int8_t;
00041 typedef short                ctk_int16_t;
00042 typedef int                  ctk_int32_t;
00043 typedef long long            ctk_int64_t;
00044 typedef unsigned char        ctk_uint8_t;
00045 typedef unsigned short       ctk_uint16_t;
00046 typedef unsigned int         ctk_uint32_t;
00047 typedef unsigned long long   ctk_uint64_t;
00048 
00049 typedef ctk_uint32_t         ls_addr_t;   
00050 typedef ctk_uint32_t         ls_size_t;   
00051 typedef ctk_uint64_t         ea_addr_t;   
00052 typedef ctk_uint64_t         ea_size_t;   
00053 typedef ctk_uint32_t         ea_addr32_t; 
00054 typedef ctk_uint32_t         dma_size_t;  
00057 enum {
00058     CTK_SPE_CONTEXT_T, 
00059     CTK_SPE_THREAD_T, 
00060     CTK_SPE_THREAD_GROUP_T, 
00061     /* CTK_SPE_TASK_T, */
00062 };

00064 #ifdef __cplusplus
00065 # define __cast(type, val)    (reinterpret_cast<type>(val))
00066 # define __static_cast(type, val)    (static_cast<type>(val))
00067 #else
00068 # define __cast(type, val)           ((type)(val))
00069 # define __static_cast(type, val)    ((type)(val))
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #define ptr2int(p) (unsigned long)(p) 
00073 #define int2ptr(p) (void *)(p)        
00076 #define EAADDR(p)     ((ea_addr_t)ptr2int(p))
00077 
00079 #define __PTR(p)      ((void*)(unsigned long)(p))
00080 
00081 /* Union type for ull (unsigned long long, 64-bit) and
00082  * ui (unsigned int, 32-bit) addresses */
00083 typedef union {
00084     ctk_uint64_t ull;
00085     ctk_uint32_t ui[2];
00086 } ctk_addr64_t;
00087 
00088 /* 64-bit union type for various sizes of integers */
00089 typedef union {
00090     ctk_uint8_t  val8[8];
00091     ctk_uint16_t val16[4];
00092     ctk_uint32_t val32[2];
00093     ctk_uint64_t val64;
00094 
00095     unsigned long long ull[2];
00096     unsigned int ui[4];
00097     unsigned short us[8];
00098     unsigned char uc[16];
00099     float f[4];
00100     double d[2];
00101 
00102     ea_addr_t ea_addr;
00103 } ctk_val64_t;
00104 
00105 #ifdef __ALTIVEC__
00106 # undef __APPLE_ALTIVEC__
00107 # include <altivec.h>
00108 # undef bool
00109 # define bool _Bool
00110 #endif /* __ALTIVEC__ */
00111 
00112 /* 128-bit union type for various sizes of integers */
00113 typedef union {
00114     ctk_uint8_t  val8[16];
00115     ctk_uint16_t val16[8];
00116     ctk_uint32_t val32[4];
00117     ctk_uint64_t val64[2];
00118 #if defined(__ALTIVEC__) || defined(__SPU__)
00119     vector signed char qwval;
00120 #endif
00121 } ctk_val128_t __attribute__((aligned(16)));
00122 
00123 #ifndef LS_SIZE
00124 #define LS_SIZE         0x40000         
00125 #define LS_ADDR_SHIFT   18
00126 #define LS_ADDR_MASK    (LS_SIZE - 1)   
00127 #endif /* LS_SIZE */
00128 
00129 #define ALIGN_DOWN(v, align) ((v)&(-align)) 
00130 #define ALIGN_UP(v, align)   ALIGN_DOWN((v)+((align)-1), align) 
00131 #define IS_ALIGNED(v, align) (((v)&((align)-1)) == 0) 
00133 #define ALIGN_DOWN_PTR(v, align) (void*)ALIGN_DOWN((unsigned long)(v), align) 
00134 #define ALIGN_UP_PTR(v, align)   (void*)ALIGN_UP((unsigned long)(v), align) 
00135 #define IS_ALIGNED_PTR(v, align) (((unsigned long)(v)&((align)-1)) == 0) 
00137 #define IS_POWEROF2(v)       (((v)&(v-1)) == 0)              
00139 #define ROUND_DOWN(v, align) ((int)((int)(v) / (align)) * (align))
00140 #define ROUND_UP(v, align)   ((int)(((int)(v) + ((align) - 1)) / (align)) * (align))
00141 
00142 #if defined(_LP64)
00143 
00144 # define ea_hi32(x)  (ctk_uint32_t)(((ctk_uint64_t)ptr2int(x))>>32 & 0xffffffff)
00145 #elif defined(__SPU__)
00146 
00147 # define ea_hi32(x)  (ctk_uint32_t)(((ctk_uint64_t)(x))>>32 & 0xffffffff)
00148 #else /* !SPU && !LP64 */
00149 
00150 # define ea_hi32(x)  0x0
00151 #endif /* !SPU && !LP64 */
00152 
00154 # define ea_lo32(x)  (ctk_uint32_t)((ptr2int(x) & 0xffffffff))
